data.title: Fossil Modern Courier Stainless Steel Analog Red Dial Women's Watch-Bq3281
data.description:
Top highlights

  • Case size: 36mm; Band size: 16mm; quartz movement with 3-hand chronograph display; mineral crystal face
  • Wine plated stainless steel case; red dial without date window
  • Wine plated stainless steel bracelet with bracelet deployant closure; interchangeable with Fossil 16mm watch straps
  • Water resistant to 165 feet (50 M): suitable for short periods of exposure to water i.e washing hands or showering/bathing. Not suitable for recreational swimming, diving or snorkeling. Circumference - 175+/- 5MM
  • Warranty type:Manufacturer; 2 Years International Warranty
